products.title: San Jose Premium Midnight Blue Shutter Blinds
products.metadescription:
Not too far away from black, but still ultra chic, the san jose premium midnight blue shutter blind is absolutely stunning with a satin finish and beautiful shade.   
This shutter blind is the perfect compromise between traditional and modern too. The look of classical shutters

products.title: Daytona, Maya Blue - Plantation Shutter
products.metadescription: Daytona, maya blue - plantation shutter the serene sky blue of the daytona maya blue is pretty as a picture. The colour is the perfect shade for the smooth, durable faux wood that the shutter is made from. Choose from caf, full height, or tier on tier fo
products.productdescription: The serene sky blue of the daytona maya blue is pretty as a picture. The colour is the perfect shade for the smooth, durable faux wood that the shutter is made from. Choose from caf, full height, or tier on tier for the style that best suits your home.Soft whites and luxe creams will go beautifully with the lovely maya blue. Opt for a shabby chic or vintage look in a living room or bedroom to really make the most of this attractive shutter.

products.title: Daytona, River Mist Blue - Plantation Shutter
products.metadescription: Daytona, river mist blue - plantation shutter the daytone in river mist blue is aptly named with its dusky blue hue, pretty and understated. Choose this durable faux wood shutter in one of three distinct styles: the classic full height, the quirky boutiqu
products.productdescription: The daytone in river mist blue is aptly named with its dusky blue hue, pretty and understated. Choose this durable faux wood shutter in one of three distinct styles: the classic full height, the quirky boutique caf, or the versatile tier on tier.The river mist blue is the ideal addition to a nautical-themed room, where it will sit pretty amidst soft off-whites and shabby chic dcor. Include the occasional boat or anchor illustration, as well as rope, glass, and wood ornaments and frames.
